warningDescription: Multa at kulong ang kahihinatnan mo kung ikaw ay nahuling nagbebenta o namamahagi ng peke o ilegal na sigarilyo

cardArticles.title: Lugi ang taumbayan
cardArticles.description: Illicit trade is detrimental to the interest and welfare of the Filipinos as they get less for their money with cheap but fake, unsafe, or substandard products.

cardArticles.title: Di purkit nakamura, tama ka
cardArticles.description: Government should ensure a level playing field where all legitimate, tax paying industries can compete for their fair share of the free market economy.

cardArticles.title: Bilyung bilyon ang nanakaw sa Pilipino
cardArticles.description: Jobs of hard-working Filipinos are threatened with the entry and proliferation of cheap smuggled goods.

consequences.title: Php 500,000 multa
consequences.description: Mga tindahang nagbebenta ng yosi na mas mababa sa retail price

consequences.title: Php 2 Million at 5 Yrs Na Pagkulong
consequences.description: Multa at parusa para sa mga distributor na walang health warnings

consequences.title: Php 1 Million at 8 Yrs Na Pagkulong
consequences.description: Multa at parusa para sa mga nameke ng Tax Stamp
